alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 9:11PM EST until January 28 at 4:52PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Jackson and Barrow Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast to occur. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Arcade. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A few dirt access roads will be flooded. A residential yard just downstream will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 10.2 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...The river will rise to 14.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 9.8 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to 17.1 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 915 AM EST.
